text: miru mi strilanu muttukoka munde, leka vari mahr nirnayam kaka purvame, variki vidakuliste, adi papam kadu. Mariyu variki konta paritosikanga tappakunda ivvandi. Mariyu dhanavantudu tana sakti meraku, pedavadu tana sthitini batti dharmasam'matamaina vidhanga paritosikam ivvali. Idi sajjanulaina vari vidyuktadharmam
